value.name: The Guide - Five Stars in Kyoto
value.original_name: 五つ星ツーリスト〜最高の旅、ご案内します!!〜
value.overview: An original sitcom from YTV, revolving around the employees of a travel agency in Kyoto whose job is to respond to tourist customer complaints. Once called the “Travel Master” Kyoka Takase was transferred to a different office after a conflict with her superior. However with her expertise in planning and numerous connections, she uses her skills to create the perfect travel plan one customer at a time!
